text: Pas ej mū'minon cun ʙo kofiron rū ʙa rū şuded dar majdoni çang, gardanaşonro ʙizaned. Ba hamcunin idoma dihed, to ʙa andozae duşmanro ʙa kuştan jo zaxmī kardan, za'if namoed va cun onhoro saxt furū kufted, asiraşon kuned va saxt ʙiʙanded. On goh onohro ʙa ehson ozod kuned jo ʙa fidja (ʙa ivazi pulu mol). To on goh, ki çang ʙa pojon ojad. Va in ast hukmi Alloh. Va agar Alloh mexost (na ʙa rohi çang, ʙalki az rohhoi digare, misli tūfon, zaminlarza, sel, ƣarq soxtan va digar ofatho) az on kofiron intiqom megirift, vale xost, to şumoro ʙa jakdigar ʙijozmojad. Va onon, ki dar rohi Alloh kuşta şudaand, hargiz savoʙi a'molaşonro ʙotil namekunad
